content: purchase 2 patterns get 10% off purchase 3 patterns get 15% off no code necessary these are super quick to make and a great way to use up some scrap yarn i used some left over yarn from another project using i love this cotton yarn in colors coral buttercup aspyn aqua and periwinkle what you will need yarn - approx 10-12 yards of worsted weight yarn per scrunchie hook - u s i/5 5 mm hair bands needle for weaving in ends
